ClassSpecifierConstant Properties

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from Constant»RefNumConstant. View the class hierarchy.

PropertyDescription
All Types[]Returns an array of all possible types for the class specifier constant, as well as the inheritance relationship between the types. Details
Class NameReturns the name of the currently selected class. Or, changes the selected class to the specified class name. Details
TerminalReturns a reference to the output terminal of a class-specifier constant. Details
TypeGets or sets the class of the class specifier constant in the form of a string. Details
